Sept. 7, 1929 D Nuneaton Contest
Nuneaton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
nuneaton-contest
None
A Souvenir of the Opera
Chilver's Coton Sports Ground, Nuneaton, Warwickshire Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£1)Coventry Silver, 2nd(10s.) Fleckney. First annual contest promoted by Griff Colliery Band. 8 bands competed.
Oct. 15, 2013, 7:35 a.m. Oct. 15, 2013, 7:56 a.m.
